getContentDescription().Description: Gets the current content description for the tile.

getIcon().Description: Gets the current icon for the tile.

updateTile().Description: Pushes the state of the Tile to Quick Settings to be displayed.

setState(int).Description: Sets the current state for the tile. Does not take effect until @B_android#service#quicksettings#Tile#updateTile_E@ is called.

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

getLabel().Description: Gets the current label for the tile.

setIcon(android.graphics.drawable.Icon).Description: Sets the current icon for the tile. This icon is expected to be white on alpha, and may be tinted by the system to match it's theme. Does not take effect until @B_android#service#quicksettings#Tile#updateTile_E@ is called.

Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel in which the object should be written.
int: Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).Description: Flatten this object in to a Parcel.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

Parameters: CharSequence: New content description to use.
setContentDescription(java.lang.CharSequ.Description: Sets the current content description for the tile. Does not take effect until @B_android#service#quicksettings#Tile#updateTile_E@ is called.

getSubtitle().Description: Gets the current subtitle for the tile.

Parameters: CharSequence: the subtitle to show. This value may be null.
setSubtitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the subtitle for the tile. Will be displayed as the secondary label.

Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel in which the object should be written.

int: Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@, and android.os.Parcelable.PARCELABLE_ELIDE_DUPLICATES
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel,int).Description: Flatten this object in to a Parcel.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel,int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

setLabel(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the current label for the tile. Does not take effect until @B_android#service#quicksettings#Tile#updateTile_E@ is called.

getState().Description: The current state of the tile.

ClassDesc: A Tile holds the state of a tile that will be displayed in Quick Settings. A tile in Quick Settings exists as an icon with an accompanied label. It also may have content description for accessibility usability. The style and layout of the tile may change to match a given device.
